citation.article-title: Transfer of [Flexibacter] sancti, [Flexibacter] filiformis, [Flexibacter] japonensis and [Cytophaga] arvensicola to the genus Chitinophaga and description of Chitinophaga skermanii sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Chitinophaga sancti comb. nov.

Chitinophaga sancti [sanc′ti. L. n. sanctus saint; L. gen. n. sancti of Saint, perhaps named in honour of Dr Santos Soriano, from whose laboratory the type strain was supplied (the etymology is not clear)].
The description is identical to that given by Lewin (1969) with the additional chemotaxonomic data provided by Reichenbach (1989), Hamana & Nakagawa (2001) and this study.
The type strain is ATCC 23092T=DSM 784T=HAMBI 1988T=NBRC 15057T=LMG 8377T=VKM B-1428T.
